kannada_original: ಆಸೆ ಬೋನಿನ ಒಳಗೆ ಇದೆ ಭಯದ ಹುಲಿಕರಡಿ;
english_transliteration: Āse bōnina oḷage ide bhayada hulikaraḍi;
english_translation: Inside the cage of desire, there is the tiger and bear of fear;
It is very, very difficult to get out of it!

kannada_original: ಪಂಜ ಬಡಿದರೆ ಮುಖಕೆ ಚಿಮ್ಮಿ ಬರುವುದು ರಕ್ತ;
english_transliteration: Pan̄ja baḍidare mukhake cimmi baruvudu rakta;
english_translation: If the claw strikes, blood will splash onto the face;
Stay outside the cage – Muddu Rāma.
